metadata.title: CVE-2023-2133 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in Service Worker API in Google Chrome prior to112.0.5615.137 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
